Let me share with you the foundational talking points that expose the hollow shell of the globe myth.

The most obvious and irrefutable evidence is the horizon. No matter how high you ascend (even in a plane or on a tall building), the horizon always appears perfectly flat. If the Earth were a globe spinning at 1,000 mph, wouldn't we see curvature? Yet, even NASA astronauts claim they can’t see it from the International Space Station. That’s a red flag if ever there was one.

---

### 2. **Water Always Levels Itself**
Water, in its natural state, is flat. You can’t make it curved. If the Earth were round, water would have to curve to match the Earth’s surface. But we never observe that. The oceans, lakes, and rivers all remain perfectly level. The idea that water conforms to a spherical shape is a violation of basic physics and common sense.

---

The idea of gravity as a force is a tool of distraction, used to explain away inconsistencies in the globe model.

---

The Sun is a small, local object that moves in a circular path over the flat Earth, illuminating only a portion at a time.
